Case_Structure
Class Case

java.lang.Object
  Case_Structure.Case

public class Case
extends java.lang.Object

Basic structure for a single general Case-Based Reasoning case.

existsSolution

public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> existsSolution(java.lang.String name)
Checks if exists any solution with the given name/identifier (see Solution.getValuesAndNames())

Parameters:
name - String solution unique name/identifier.
Returns:
ArrayList> with the hierarchical element positions or empty if doesn't exist any. Here are some examples of each of the ArrayList instances. Example1: [3, 2, 0]: level0: solution3, level1: component2, level2: component0 Example2: [0, 1]: level0: solution0, level1: component1
